trans-unit.source: Directs tracing or debugging output to either the standard output or the standard error stream.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪或调试输出到标准输出或标准错误流的定向。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener"></xref> class with trace output written to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener"></xref>并将跟踪输出写入到标准输出流的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener> object to write messages to the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>对象以将消息写入到<xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName>流。</xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is initialized to an empty string ("").
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener"></xref> class with an option to write trace output to the standard output stream or the standard error stream.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener"></xref>类用于将跟踪输出写入到标准输出流或标准错误流的选项。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener> object to write messages to either the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>对象将消息写入到任一<xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>流。</xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is initialized to an empty string ("").

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write tracing and debugging output to the standard error stream; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to write tracing and debugging output to the standard output stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要写入跟踪和调试到标准错误流; 输出<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>编写跟踪和调试到标准输出流的输出。

trans-unit.source: Closes the output to the stream specified for this trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 关闭到为此跟踪侦听器指定的流的输出。

trans-unit.source: The stream specified for this <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener> instance (either the <xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream or the <xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> stream) is closed.
trans-unit.target: 为此指定的流<xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>实例 (请<xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName>流或<xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>流) 已关闭。</xref:System.Console.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Console.Out%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>
